rows.label: tlk400802_msg0002
rows.name:
A scruffy-looking boy ran up
the stairs like a flash, mo.

rows.label: tlk400802_msg0003
rows.name:
Popipii has traveled to many
countries, and there are kids
like that everywhere, mo.

rows.label: tlk400802_msg0004
rows.name:
In Superbia, in Invidia, and even
in Acedia, the gap between rich
and poor is still there, mo.

rows.label: tlk400802_msg0006
rows.name:
Wait, are you chasing him
because he stole something, mo?

rows.label: tlk400802_msg0007
rows.name:
*Sigh*... When you're traveling,
it's a rule to keep your valuables
on you at all times, mo.

rows.label: tlk400802_msg0008
rows.name:
I'm sorry... I'll be more
careful from now on...
